Name: Overheat
Desc:
Researches Gauntlet Revolvers to learn about the basics of the Revolving Gauntlet. Enemies who are hit by direct Gauntlet Revolver attacks receive additional heat damage.
Lv. 5 Effect: Can learn the 2nd Job skill, Enhanced Overheat.

Desc.Old:
Researches Gauntlet Revolvers to learn about the basics of the Revolving Gauntlet. Enemies who are hit by overheated Gauntlet Revolvers receive additional heat DAMAGE.
Applicable Skills: Magnum Drive, Double Drive, Charging Arm: Smash, Shockwave Drive, Hurricane Blaster, Magnum Flash, Charging Arm: Devastator, Vulcan Punch, Burning Breaker
Lv. 5 Effect: Can learn the 2nd skill, Enhanced Overheat
Desc.New:
Researches Gauntlet Revolvers to learn about the basics of the Revolving Gauntlet. Enemies who are hit by direct Gauntlet Revolver attacks receive additional heat damage.
Lv. 5 Effect: Can learn the 2nd Job skill, Enhanced Overheat.

H.Old:
[Final Attack Skill] Direct attacks with a Gauntlet Revolver causes an additional attack that attacks up to 6 enemies at 120% DAMAGE 1 times.
Permanently increases SPEED +30, JUMP +15, and MAX SPEED +20.
H.New:
[Final Attack Type Skill] Direct Gauntlet Revolver attack hits activate an additional attack that attacks up to 6 enemies at 120% Damage.
Permanently increases Speed +30, Jump +15, and Max Speed +20.
